pr_title: Add more functions to TMCC throttle

timeline.message:
Update SerialThrottle.java

Add function codes for buttons F22 thru F27

Update index.shtml

Changed some of the verbage on the capabilites of Lionel TMCC

timeline.bodyText: I think that the trailing comma needs to be suppressed here.
timeline.author: mattharris

replies.bodyText:
Thanks for checking this PR.
Java has no problem with the comma. I checked it now on my local computer and it handles SERIAL_FUNCTION_CODES correct. And all CI has passed.
But if you want it changed anyway then I can ask the orginal author to change it. The PR is from his branch so I cannot do the change myself.
replies.author: danielb987

replies.bodyText: Happy to have this merged as-is - we can follow this up later.
replies.author: mattharris
